personas.name: Financial Advisor (Berater)
personas.description: A financial advisor who is a member of a coaching program and needs to track their ROI performance against projections to measure the effectiveness of the coaching investment.
goals: Track actual performance vs RW projections to measure ROI
Understand which customer acquisition channels are most effective
Make data-driven decisions about business investments
Export data for external analysis and reporting
See visual progress over time to stay motivated
pain_points: Current MVP uses localStorage - data not accessible across devices
No multi-user support - can't share with team or coach
Manual data entry is time-consuming
Difficult to compare actuals vs projections at a glance
No historical versioning of projections
personas.context: German-speaking financial advisor who joined Richtungswechsel coaching program. Uses the tool monthly to track performance, primarily on desktop during business hours. Needs German UI/UX. Values simplicity and speed over complex features.

personas.name: Coaching Company Admin (Organisations-Admin)
personas.description: Owner/manager of a coaching company (like Richtungswechsel) who provides ROI tracking to their clients (financial advisors). Needs to manage multiple advisors, view aggregate performance, and ensure clients are getting value from the coaching program.
goals: Manage multiple financial advisor accounts efficiently
View performance dashboard across all advisors to measure coaching effectiveness
Identify advisors who need additional support based on performance gaps
Export aggregate data for program improvement and marketing
Ensure data security and multi-tenancy isolation
pain_points: No visibility into client performance in current MVP
Manual account creation and management
Can't identify at-risk clients proactively
No aggregate reporting for program ROI
Difficult to scale beyond a few clients
personas.context: German-speaking coaching company owner managing 10-25 financial advisors. Needs admin dashboard with overview metrics, user management, and reporting. Values reliability, security, and scalability.

journeys.name: Advisor Onboarding and First Projection
journeys.description: New financial advisor signs up, enters initial ROI data, and views their first 12-month projection

phases.name: Account Creation
phases.description: Advisor creates account via Clerk authentication and completes profile

touchpoints.name: Sign-up Form
touchpoints.description: Clerk-powered sign-up with email/password or OAuth
pain_points: Uncertainty about data privacy
Friction in email verification
opportunities: Add social OAuth (Google) for faster signup
Show trust badges (data security, GDPR compliance)

touchpoints.name: Welcome Screen
touchpoints.description: Post-signup welcome with quick tutorial on ROI tracking
opportunities: Offer calendar integration for monthly reminders

phases.name: Initial Data Entry
phases.description: Advisor enters baseline business data across 3 tabs (Einnahmen, Kunden, Kosten)

touchpoints.name: Eingaben Page - Tab 1: Einnahmen
touchpoints.description: Revenue input form with German field labels
pain_points: Unclear what exact values to enter
No guidance on typical ranges
opportunities: Offer CSV import from accounting software

touchpoints.name: Eingaben Page - Tab 2: Kunden
touchpoints.description: Customer acquisition input across multiple channels
user_actions: Enter customer counts for Mitgliederportal, Online, Offline, Einzelcoaching
pain_points: Difficult to estimate future customer acquisition

touchpoints.name: Eingaben Page - Tab 3: Kosten
touchpoints.description: Cost input for customer acquisition and monthly fixed costs
system_actions: Trigger Cloud Function for projection calculation
pain_points: Uncertainty about which scenario to choose

phases.name: Projection Review
phases.description: Advisor views calculated 12-month RW projections with charts

touchpoints.name: RW Tracking Page
pain_points: Charts may be overwhelming for first-time users
opportunities: Provide projection summary (total ROI, break-even month)
Enable PDF export for client presentations

success_metrics.target: 85% of new advisors complete all 3 input tabs
success_metrics.measurement: Firestore query for advisors with version > 0 ROI inputs

success_metrics.target: < 15 minutes from signup to viewing RW projections
success_metrics.measurement: createdAt timestamp diff between advisor and rwProjections documents

success_metrics.target: < 5% of advisors leave default 0 values in all fields
success_metrics.measurement: Count roiInputs with sum of all numeric fields = 0

journeys.name: Monthly Actual Data Entry and Performance Review
journeys.description: Advisor enters actual monthly performance and compares to projections

phases.name: Monthly Data Entry
phases.description: Advisor logs actual customers, revenue, and costs for the month

touchpoints.name: IST Tracking Page
touchpoints.description: Form to enter actual monthly performance data
pain_points: Forgetting to enter data monthly
Manual data entry is tedious
opportunities: Add email/SMS reminders on 1st of month

phases.name: Performance Comparison
phases.description: Advisor reviews IST vs RW variance to understand performance gaps

touchpoints.name: Performance Analytics Page
touchpoints.description: Side-by-side comparison of projections vs actuals with variance highlights
system_actions: Join RW projections with IST actuals by month
Calculate % variance for revenue and customers
pain_points: Seeing negative variance is demotivating
Unclear what actions to take to improve
opportunities: Add AI-powered insights (e.g., 'You're 15% below in online customer acquisition')
Show recommended actions based on gaps

touchpoints.name: Performance Charts
touchpoints.description: Visual charts comparing projected vs actual performance over time
user_actions: Toggle between revenue, customers, costs, ROI views
system_actions: Render dual-line charts (projected in blue, actual in orange)
pain_points: Charts can be cluttered with too much data

success_metrics.target: 75% of advisors enter IST data within 7 days of month end
success_metrics.measurement: Count monthlyActuals.createdAt within 7 days of month boundary

success_metrics.target: 60% of advisors view Performance Analytics page at least once per month
success_metrics.measurement: Analytics event tracking for page views

success_metrics.target: 50% reduction in performance gaps after 3 months of tracking
success_metrics.measurement: Average absolute variance (IST vs RW) trending downward

journeys.name: Admin Dashboard - Advisor Management
journeys.description: Coaching company admin manages advisors, views aggregate performance, and identifies support needs

phases.name: Admin Login and Dashboard Access
phases.description: Admin logs in with elevated permissions and accesses organization dashboard

touchpoints.name: Admin Login
touchpoints.description: Clerk authentication with role-based redirect to admin dashboard
pain_points: No dedicated admin login flow

phases.name: Advisor Monitoring
phases.description: Admin views list of all advisors with performance summary

touchpoints.name: Advisor List Table
touchpoints.description: Sortable/filterable table of all advisors with key metrics
user_actions: Click advisor row to view details
system_actions: Show status indicators (green = on track, yellow = slightly behind, red = significantly behind)
pain_points: Difficult to identify at-risk advisors at a glance
No alerting for advisors falling behind
opportunities: Add automatic alerts for advisors with >20% negative variance

touchpoints.name: Advisor Detail View
touchpoints.description: Drill-down view of individual advisor's full ROI journey
system_actions: Show all versions of ROI inputs
pain_points: Switching between multiple views is cumbersome
opportunities: Add side-by-side comparison with cohort average

touchpoints.name: Organization Dashboard
touchpoints.description: High-level metrics for entire coaching program
user_actions: Review average ROI across all advisors
pain_points: No real-time updates - requires page refresh

success_metrics.target: Admins check dashboard at least 2x per week
success_metrics.measurement: Analytics event tracking for admin dashboard page views

success_metrics.target: Admins contact 80% of advisors flagged as 'significantly behind' within 48 hours
100% of admins export quarterly reports for program evaluation
success_metrics.measurement: Count of PDF/CSV exports from organization dashboard per quarter

journeys.name: Data Export and External Analysis
journeys.description: Advisor exports their ROI data for use in presentations, tax preparation, or external analysis

phases.name: Export Request
phases.description: Advisor selects export format and initiates download

touchpoints.name: Export Modal
touchpoints.description: Modal dialog with export options (RW projections, IST actuals, performance comparison, full report)
system_actions: Trigger Cloud Function to generate CSV
pain_points: Export takes time to generate
No notification when ready
opportunities: Add email notification when export is ready
Enable scheduled exports (e.g., monthly automatic email)

touchpoints.name: Download Link
touchpoints.description: Link to download CSV file from Firebase Storage
system_actions: Serve file from Firebase Storage via signed URL
pain_points: Link expires after 24 hours - may lose access
opportunities: Add 'Export History' page to re-download old exports
Support direct integration with Google Sheets
Enable API access for programmatic exports

success_metrics.target: 40% of active advisors export data at least once per quarter
success_metrics.measurement: Count unique advisorIds with exports per quarter

success_metrics.target: 98% of export requests complete successfully within 30 seconds

optimization_opportunities.title: Automated Data Import from Accounting Software
optimization_opportunities.description: Integrate with popular German accounting tools (DATEV, Lexware, sevDesk) to auto-populate IST data monthly, reducing manual entry burden and improving data accuracy.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Reduce monthly data entry time from 5 minutes to <1 minute. Increase IST data entry compliance from 75% to 90%.

optimization_opportunities.title: AI-Powered Performance Insights
optimization_opportunities.description: Add intelligent recommendations based on variance analysis (e.g., 'Your online acquisition is 20% below target. Consider increasing ad spend or improving landing page conversion.') to guide advisors toward corrective actions.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Increase advisor engagement with performance review by 30%. Reduce average variance from 15% to 10% within 3 months.

optimization_opportunities.title: Mobile App for On-the-Go Data Entry
optimization_opportunities.description: Develop React Native mobile app for iOS/Android to enable advisors to log IST data from their phone during commute or between client meetings.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Increase IST data entry compliance by 15%. Improve user satisfaction with convenience rating from 3.5/5 to 4.5/5.

optimization_opportunities.title: Gamification and Peer Benchmarking
optimization_opportunities.description: Add leaderboard showing anonymous performance comparison with peer advisors in same cohort. Award badges for milestones (e.g., '3 months above target', 'Top 10% ROI').
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Increase monthly active users by 20%. Boost motivation and reduce churn from 10% to 5% per quarter.

optimization_opportunities.title: Advanced Admin Analytics Dashboard
optimization_opportunities.description: Enhance admin dashboard with cohort analysis, retention curves, LTV predictions, and custom report builder. Enable segmentation by license type, join date, or performance tier.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Reduce admin time spent on reporting from 2 hours/week to 30 minutes/week. Enable data-driven program improvements leading to 10% better average advisor ROI.

optimization_opportunities.title: Interactive Onboarding Tutorial
optimization_opportunities.description: Replace static welcome screen with interactive Shepherd.js or Intro.js product tour that guides new advisors through first data entry step-by-step.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Increase onboarding completion rate from 85% to 95%. Reduce time-to-first-projection from 15 minutes to 12 minutes.

optimization_opportunities.title: Reminder System for Monthly Data Entry
optimization_opportunities.description: Implement automated email/SMS reminders on the 1st and 5th of each month prompting advisors to enter their IST data. Allow customization of reminder frequency in settings.
optimization_opportunities.expected_improvement: Increase IST data entry compliance from 75% to 85%. Reduce average delay in data entry from 7 days to 3 days.
